Moved site to private repo

Moved this site to a repo away from prying eyes. the username is a nickname given by a friend. Its a pain to change the username again and again before pushing, but ill add it to the script.

git config credential.username "<username>"

The long ass command arrgh.

Just added to the script, works fine

:)
